blogs.title: My First Blog
blogs.body:
Why do we use it?
It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted while on it.
   We have yet to understand and experience the full consequences of internet pornography and the damage it will bring about. 
Pornography destroys lives, marriages, families, society, and culture.
 In recent years the internet has introduced an even more poisonous form of
 counterfeit and deception in OnlyFans. I won’t go into the details of OnlyFans,
 but I’ve included a link for The Knowledge for Men Podcast titled
 “The Darkside of OnlyFans: How OnlyFans Hijacked the Souls of Men and Women in a Few Years.”
 It explains some things about OnlyFans and how it is potentially 
even more poisonous than what we’ve seen in online pornography.
 As a preface, it is not a Christian podcast and may require listener discretion. 
If that sounds like a problem for you, don’t listen to it.
blogs.author: Nnamdi

blogs.title: Our Innitial Blog
blogs.body: Ponography is very dangerous to human health spiritually and psychologically
blogs.author: Indexman
